jei.survivalistessentials.description.ro: Auf dem Boden liegende Steinbrocken. Diese können mit einem Messer in einer Werkbank verwendet werden, um Feuersteinsplitter herzustellen.
jei.survivalistessentials.description.pl: Pflanzenfasern können beim Abbau von Gras mit einem Messer erhalten werden. Sie werden zur Herstellung von Pflanzenschnüren für Werkzeuge und Pflanzenpaste für Verbandsalben verwendet.
jei.survivalistessentials.description.st: Stöcke können beim Abbau von Blättern erhalten werden. Die Verwendung eines Messers verdoppelt die Chance auf einen Stock.
jei.survivalistessentials.description.fl: Feuersteinsplitter können erhalten werden, indem man Feuerstein auf eine beliebige felsige Oberfläche schlägt. Wenn ein Feuerstein auf einen steinartigen Block geschlagen wird, könnte er sich in zwei Feuersteinsplitter aufteilen.
tooltip.uselessTool2: Kann nur zur Herstellung verwendet werden.
tooltip.uselessWeapon1: Diese Waffe schlägt wie eine nasse Nudel!
modifier.insulated_armor.description: Fügt einem Rüstungsteil einen +1 Heizmodifikator hinzu. Nicht stapelbar.
modifier.chilling_armor.description: Fügt einem Rüstungsteil einen -1 Kühlmodifikator hinzu. Nicht stapelbar.
modifier.survivalistessentials.mana.desc: Repairs item in inventory if mana providing item exists.
advancements.survivalistessentials.crude: Dein erstes Messer. Es sieht nicht sehr scharf aus, aber vielleicht kannst du damit etwas Gras schneiden.
Mit der Primitiven Axt kannst du Holz und andere Rohstoffe erhalten.
Teilt Stämme in Bretter und Bretter in Stöcke, falls in der SurvivalistEssentials-Konfiguration aktiviert. Sonst macht es nichts.
advancements.survivalistessentials.flint: Erhalte einen Feuerstein, indem du mit bloßen Händen Kies abbaust. Schlage dann den Feuerstein gegen eine felsige Oberfläche (Rechtsklick auf z. B. Stein), um zwei Feuersteinsplitter zu erhalten. Beachte die scharfen Kanten!
advancements.survivalistessentials.plant: Wenn daraus Hosen hergestellt werden, machen sie ein fiependes Geräusch, wenn man ... FIEEEP
Sie liegen entweder herum oder können durch Abbau von Erde mit den Händen erhalten werden. Es scheint nichts zu nützen... Vielleicht, wenn ich vier hätte?
Survivalist Essentials-Rezepte. Tipp: Baue etwas Kies ab!
advancements.survivalistessentials.stick: Du kannst ein paar Stöcke finden, indem du ein paar Blätter abbaust. Stock und Stein brechen mein Gebein, doch Worte bringen ... doch Pein, denn jeder kümmert sich um Worte, die einem ins Gesicht gesagt werden.
advancements.survivalistessentials.toolf: Lass uns einige noch aufwändigere Werkzeuge bauen.
MOD_TOOL_WHITELIST.tooltip: List of mods that tools will always work for. All other mod tools will become wet noodles.
TOOLS_WHITELIST.tooltip: List of individual tools that will always work. Format tooltype-modid:item
MOD_ARMOR_WHITELIST.tooltip: List of mods that armor will always work and be craftable for. All other mod armor will not be equipable or craftable.
ARMOR_WHITELIST.tooltip: List of individual armor items that will always work. Format modid:item
ARMOR_TEMP_MODIFIERS.tooltip: List of all armor with temperature modifiers. Format modid:item=modifier
INSULATED_MODIFIER.tooltip: Construct's Armory wool insulation modifier amount.
CHILLING_MODIFIER.tooltip: Construct's Armory jelled slime cooling modifier amount.
ENABLE_ROCKGEN.tooltip: Enables the generation of rock piles on the surface. Default true
ROCKGEN_CHANCE.tooltip: Chance for a rocks to generate on surface. Default 1.0D (= 100%)
ENABLE_ROCK_FROM_DIRT.tooltip: Enables rock drop from harvesting dirt. (default: false)
ROCK_FROM_DIRT_CHANCE.tooltip: Chance for a rocks to drop from harvesting dirt with bare hands. Default 0.4 (= 40%)
FLINT_CHANCE.tooltip: Chance for a successful flint knapping. Default 60% - 0.6D
GRASS_FIBER_CHANCE.tooltip: Chance for tall grass to drop plant fibers. Default 60% - 0.6D. Knives are 40% more effective.
HEAL_RATE.tooltip: Heal rate for bandages. Crude bandages are 50% less effective.
SLOW_DOWN_MULTIPLIER.tooltip: Option to adjust slow down on wrong tool usage. Default 1.0)
GRIEFING_WHITELIST.tooltip: Ok, I love endermen, make them pick up this stuff. If NO_GRIEFING=true
NO_SLEEPING.tooltip: I cry myself to sleep at night...
SLOW_DOWN_DIRT_PUNCHING.tooltip: Includes dirt in the slowdown of mining speed with bare hands. Default true
ENABLE_SAW.tooltip: Enables the saw item to craft planks. Default true
FORCE_SAW_FOR_PLANKS.tooltip: Removes plank and stick recipes from the game, only craftable with saw. Default true
ENABLE_FAIL_SOUND.tooltip: Enables the fail sound if using the wrong tool.
info.survivalistessentials.book.subtitle: A Path to Survival
info.survivalistessentials.book.intro: Welcome to Survivalist Essentials!$(br)$(br)There are few very important things to remember when playing:$(br)$(li)A correct tool is required for harvesting.$(li)The only way to craft Wooden Planks and Sticks is with a saw.
info.survivalistessentials.book.getting_: Gathering basic materials for crafting crude tools is essential for getting started. The following pages will cover what you MUST gather to survive.

You may notice right away some small piles of rocks lying randomly on the ground throughout the world.$(br)$(br)Break and gather them quickly, they are a valuable AND necessary resource and needed for crafting tools.

Sticks are essenial for creating your first Crude Tools. These are the most basic handles.$(br)$(br)Punching leaves and will drop sticks. The drop rate is not great but it will allow you to get sticks. Once you craft a knife, you can use it to increase the drop rate.

Crude tools need Flint Shards!$(br)$(br)Simply knapp (right-click) Rocks you've gathered on a hard surface (any regular Stone/Cobblestone/Granite/etc. hard blocks) and with a bit of luck, you can split them in half to obtain shards.$(br)$(br)Once you have the $(l:survivalistessentials:tools/crude_tools)Crude Knife$(), you can make more shards in your crafting grid.

Next you'll need to get some Plant Fiber.$(br)$(br)Plant Fiber is a new drop when breaking grass or most plants with the Crude Knife. Grass is probably the easiest way to get Plant Fiber.$(br)$(br)You'll need Plant Fiber to craft Plant String used in crafting the Crude Hatchet, Crude Saw and Bandages.
Plant String is essential for crafting the Crude Hatchet and Crude Saw. Gather enough Plant Fiber!
info.survivalistessentials.book.tools.de: Tools are essential for gathering materials and getting your first wood planks!$(br)$(br)Punching trees is no longer an option, so you'll need these most basic tools to be able to craft better tools, or more advanced items using the crafting table.
info.survivalistessentials.book.tools.cr: Crude Knife is essential for gathering Plant Fiber. This MUST be the first tool crafted to progress.
In addition to more shards, you can also craft in any crafting grid:$(br)$(li)String: knife and wool$(br)$(li)Sticks: knife and saplings
Crude Hatchet is essential for gathering wood. You can now chop down trees!
Crude Saw Blade is the first part for the Crude Saw. Blades are replaceable on the Saw. The crude blades have only half the output of sharper blade materials.
The Saw Handle is a reusable part for crafting the Crude Saw. Once the blade breaks, just reuse the left over handle to create a new Saw.
Crude Saw will allow you to craft planks! Upgrade the blade to increase plank output and durability.
Here is an example recipe with the Crude Saw that will allow you to craft planks!
Here is an example recipe with the Crude Saw that will allow you to craft sticks!
info.survivalistessentials.book.tools.im: While crude tools will get you started, you'll want to create more durable tools.
info.survivalistessentials.book.health.d: It's a little more difficult getting started. To help with the process, some basic bandages are available to help in the early game.
info.survivalistessentials.book.health.i: There are several basic materials required for making bandages.
Cloth is an ingredient used for making Bandages.
Essential tool for crafting plant paste.
Ointment is an ingredient used for making Bandages.
info.survivalistessentials.book.health.b: Crude bandages are simple to make. Bandages are a little more work, but do a much better job of stopping the bleeding.
Cheap bandage, great for early game.
Better bandage, great for mid game.
